subject: Lacrosse

NCAA Lacrosse Championships
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Old-school sweats are the preferred attire for some college netminders, including Denver’s Ryan LaPlante, whose team advanced to the national final with a victory over Notre Dame.
snippet: Old-school sweats are the preferred attire for some college netminders, including Denver’s Ryan LaPlante, whose team advanced to the national final with a victory over Notre Dame.
